question: How much does a solar panel installation cost?
answer: The cost varies based on system size, location, and requirements. Residential systems typically range from ₹60,000 to ₹3,00,000. We offer free consultations and custom quotes to give you accurate pricing for your specific needs.

question: How long does solar panel installation take?
answer: Most residential installations are completed within 1-3 days. Commercial projects may take 1-2 weeks depending on the size. We ensure minimal disruption to your daily operations.

question: What is the lifespan of solar panels?
answer: Our premium solar panels come with a 20-25 year warranty and can last 30+ years with proper maintenance. The efficiency may decrease slightly over time (typically 0.5% per year), but they continue to generate significant power.

question: Will solar panels work during cloudy days or monsoon?
answer: Yes! Solar panels still generate electricity on cloudy days, though at reduced efficiency (10-25% of normal output). Our systems are designed to work in India's varied climate conditions. Any excess energy produced during sunny days is stored or fed back to the grid.

question: What maintenance do solar panels require?
answer: Solar panels require minimal maintenance. We recommend cleaning every 2-3 months to remove dust and debris, which we offer as a service. Our systems also include monitoring to alert you of any issues.

question: Can I sell excess electricity back to the grid?
answer: Yes! With net metering, you can sell excess electricity back to your utility company. This helps offset your electricity costs even further. We assist with all necessary paperwork and approvals.

question: What subsidies are available for solar installations?
answer: The Indian government offers various subsidies and incentives for solar installations. Residential users can get up to 40% subsidy on rooftop solar. We help you navigate the subsidy application process.

question: How much can I save on electricity bills?
answer: Most customers save 70-90% on their electricity bills. The exact savings depend on your current consumption, system size, and local electricity rates. Typical ROI is achieved within 3-5 years.
